verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that <S%G5613>after<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> were <S%G645>gotten<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, and had <S%G321>launched<s%>, we <S%G2064>came<s%> with a straight <S%G2113>course<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2972>Coos<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> the day <S%G1836>following<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4499>Rhodes<s%>, and from <S%G2547>thence<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3959>Patara<s%>:

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5025>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> we took up our <S%G643>carriages<s%>, and went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G304>stairs<s%>, so it <S%G4819>was<s%>, that he was <S%G941>borne<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G970>violence<s%> of the <S%G3793>people<s%>.
